items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to give up his dream of becoming an astronaut.
I\'d like to thank you again for everything you\'ve done for us.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want anything to do with Mary.
Tom and Mary dipped into their savings to buy their first house.
Tom didn\'t think that Mary would actually carry out her threat.
Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to be in Australia all week?
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she has to get home before 2:30.
I think that I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
Tom wished he hadn\'t promised Mary he\'d go to Boston with her.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anybody they\'re getting married.
